title: HELLO, WE ARE GLAD YOU FOUND US!
subtitle: Welcome to SpotFreeze Photography
about: We are a team of passionate photographers specializing in wedding photography, candid moments, and pre-wedding shoots. We capture emotions and create timeless memories that you'll cherish forever.
tagline: Transforming genuine happiness into eternal imagery

whyChooseUs.title: Storytelling, Not Just Pictures
whyChooseUs.description: We weave love stories into every frame, creating visuals that feel authentic and timeless.

whyChooseUs.title: Candid Moments, Genuine Emotions
whyChooseUs.description: Specializing in unscripted smiles, laughter, and tears - preserving emotions that last a lifetime.

whyChooseUs.title: Premium Quality & Creativity
whyChooseUs.description: From high-end gear to expert editing, every photo is crafted with luxury and artistry.

whyChooseUs.title: Experience Across Cultures & Traditions
whyChooseUs.description: From destination weddings to traditional ceremonies, we capture every culture with respect and beauty.

whyChooseUs.title: Professional & Personal Touch
whyChooseUs.description: We combine technical expertise with genuine care, making your wedding day stress-free and memorable.
